member.name: M:PayrollEngine.Backend.Controller.AdminController.StopApplication
member.summary: Requests termination of the API application
member.remarks: In IIS the application will be restarted with the next API request source https://edi.wang/post/2019/3/7/restart-an-aspnet-core-application-programmatically

member.name: M:PayrollEngine.Backend.Controller.CalendarController.GetCalendarPeriodAsync(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.param: The culture to use (default: tenant culture)
The moment within the payrun period (default: now)

The offset:
less than zero: past
zero: current (default)
greater than zero: future

member.param: The culture to use (default: tenant culture)
The moment within the payrun cycle (default: now)

The offset:
less than zero: past
zero: current (default)
greater than zero: future
